original_text: When these two apostles arrived in Samaria, they prayed for the people who now believed in Jesus. They asked God to give the new believers the Holy Spirit.
korean_text: 그들이 내려가서 그들을 위하여 성령 받기를 기도하니

sentences.original_text: When these two apostles arrived in Samaria
sentences.korean_translation: 이 두 사도가 사마리아에 도착했을 때

sentences.original_text: to give the new believers the Holy Spirit
